query: (Background: "non-small cell carcinoma"^4 OR NSCLC OR Doc_title: "non-small cell carcinoma"^4 OR NSCLC) AND (Background: MET^4 OR "HGFR" OR "AUTS9" OR "RCCP2" OR "c-Met" OR "DFNB97" OR Doc_title: MET OR "HGFR" OR "AUTS9" OR "RCCP2" OR "c-Met" OR "DFNB97") AND (Background: "treatment" OR "therapy" OR "Surgery" OR "Pneumonectomy" OR "Lobectomy" OR "Segmentectomy or wedge resection" OR "Sleeve resection" OR "Video-assisted thoracic surgery" OR "Radiofrequency Ablation" OR "radiation therapy" OR "Stereotactic radiosurgery" OR "Brachytherapy" OR "chemotherapy" OR "Targeted Therapy" OR "Bevacizumab" OR "Ramucirumab" OR "Immunotherapy" OR "Nivolumab" OR "pembrolizumab" OR "Atezolizumab" OR "Durvalumab" OR "Palliative")
